translations: n.无限，无穷；无穷数（infinity 的复数）

sentences.sentence: He also showed how one can make sense of adding and multiplying infinities.
sentences.translation: 他还演示了如何能理解将各种无穷大相加和相乘。

sentences.sentence: After all, physicists never see real infinities in nature, nor do they want to!
sentences.translation: 毕竟，物理学家从未在自然界中见过真正的无穷大，他们也不想见到！

sentences.sentence: In order to taste the infinities of life, they begin early and never go slowly.
sentences.translation: 为了把无限的生活都品尝一遍，他们抓紧时间、从不懈怠。
